vertex.lhs: Subs(Derivative(Integral(f(a, b), b), a), b, t2) - Subs(Derivative(Integral(f(a, b), b), a), b, t1)
vertex.rhs: Subs(Integral(Derivative(f(a, b), a), b), b, t2) - Subs(Integral(Derivative(f(a, b), a), b), b, t1)

vertex.lhs: Derivative(Subs(Integral(f(a, b), b), b, t2) - Subs(Integral(f(a, b), b), b, t1), a)
vertex.rhs: Subs(Integral(Derivative(f(a, b), a), b), b, t2) - Subs(Integral(Derivative(f(a, b), a), b), b, t1)

meta.desc: interchangeability of definite integral and differentiation
